DataElement.preferredName: Patient Clinical Study Agent Hypersensitivity Personal Medical History Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to a patient's hypersensitivity to an agent used in the clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Clinical Study Agent Hypersensitivity Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to patient's personal medical history including hypersensitivity to an agent used in the clinical study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Clinical Study Agent Hypersensitivity Personal Medical History
Property.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI):An exaggerated response by the immune system to a drug or other substance.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
An exaggerated response by the immune system to a drug or other substance.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Known hypersensitivity to any
ReferenceDocuments.description: Known hypersensitivity to any of the components of vorinostat or other agents used in the study

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Known hypersensitivity to any of the components of 5-fluorouracil/leucovorin, capecitabine, oxaliplatin, or bevacizumab

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known hypersensitivity reaction to any of the study drugs or excipients, e.g. polysorbate 80 and Cremophor EL?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient experienced a previous serious hypersensitivity reaction to any of the agents the patient will receive as part of the C-11 trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known sensitivity to any of the products to be administered during dosing?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Known allergy to gadolinium

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient known to be hypersensitive to aprepitant, granisetron or any kind of the components of the patch or to dexamethasone?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known hypersensitivity to any components of fosbretabulin tromethamine or bevacizumab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Known hypersensitivity to any of the components of dasatinib or bevacizumab

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of severe (NCI-CTCAE v. 4.0 greater than or equal to grade 3) allergic or anaphylactic reaction or hypersensitivity to recombinant proteins or excipients (10 mM Tris buffered saline) in the investigational agent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a known hypersensitivity to E.coli-derived proteins, Filgrastim, or any component of Filgrastim

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of hypersensitivity reaction to drugs formulated with polysorbate 80?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known allergies to ALC (acetyl-L-carnitine)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allergic reaction to irinotecan

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of severe (NCI-CTCAE v. 4.0 greater than or equal to grade 3) allergic or anaphylactic reaction or hypersensitivity to recombinant proteins or Tris buffered saline?

ReferenceDocuments.name: OHSU Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is subject sensitive to drug in panel?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have GM-CSF hypersensitivity?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text  12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known hypersensitivity reaction to any of the study drugs or excipients of these drugs (e.g., polysorbate 80), including sensitivity to benzyl alcohol

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have hypersensitivity to excipients of the study drug

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known allergy to mitoxantrone, cytarabine, or both etoposide and etoposide phosphate (Etopophos)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of hypersensitivity reactions attributed to buparlisib or to its excipients?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known sensitivity to any of the products to be administered during the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allergy to daunorubicin, cytarabine or liposomal lipids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known allergy to any component of the study treatment formulations?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known hypersensitivity to any of the test drugs, test drug classes, or excipients in the formulation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Allergy to bupropion

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allergy to daunorubicin and/or cytarabine?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any known hypersensitivity or contraindication to the components of the study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have allergic reaction to indicated agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have allergic reaction to indicated agents

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have hypersensitivity to indicated agents

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Dose the patient have known allergy or hypersensitivity to the components of the atezolizumab formulation or to any of the study drugs or excipients, (e.g., Cremophor® EL)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text13
ReferenceDocuments.description: is patient proteasome inhibitor sensitive?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of a severe hypersensitivity reaction to monoclonal antibody or pembrolizumab and/or its excipients?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of similar chemical or biological composition to olaparib or tremeliumumab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ABTC 1802 Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a known hypersensitivity or contraindication to any component of any of the study drugs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of hypersensitivity to dabrafenib, trametinib, HCQ or any other excipients or compounds of a similar chemical or biologic composition?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allergic reactions to CT contrast, iodine or shellfish?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have hypersensitivity to excipients of the study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of a severe hypersensitivity reaction to monoclonal antibody or MK-3475 pembrolizumab and/or its excipients?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 02
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known hypersensitivity to any of the components of LOXO-292?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of similar chemical or biological composition to durvalumab, olaparib, or cediranib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Dose the patient have known allergy or hypersensitivity to the components of the atezolizumab formulation or to any of the study drugs or excipients, (e.g., Cremophor® EL, polysorbate 80)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Hypersensitivity to immunotherapy and/or any of its excipients.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of similar chemical or biologic composition to ipatasertib, paclitaxel or carboplatin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of similar chemical or biologic composition to nivolumab, and/or ipilimumab including severe hypersensitivity reactions to any monoclonal antibody?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of similar chemical or biologic composition to olaparib, copanlisib, or other agents used in this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known hypersensitivity to any component of tiragolumab or atezolizumab injection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known hypersensitivity to Chinese hamster ovary cell products or to any component of the atezolizumab or tiragolumab formulation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of similar chemical or biologic composition to ZEN003694 or M1774 used in study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known hypersensitivity to the study drugs or their ingredients?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have history of allergic reaction to the study agents, compound of similar chemical or biologic composition of the study agents or any of their excipients?
